properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLACE WHERE PLACE_TITLE LIKE ? AND PLACE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT PLACE_NO , PLACE_TITLE , PLACE_ADDRESS , PLACE_IMAGE_PATH , PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE FROM PLACE P LEFT JOIN PLACE_IMAGE USING (PLACE_NO) WHERE PLACE_STATUS = 'Y' AND PLACE_TITLE LIKE ? ORDER BY PLACE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM PLACE_LIKE JOIN PLACE USING(PLACE_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND PLACE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT PLACE_NO, PLACE_TITLE, PLACE_CONTENT_POINT, PLACE_CONTENT_DETAIL, PLACE_COUNT, PLACE_IMAGE_PATH, PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE FROM (SELECT LIKE_NO, PLACE_NO, USER_NO FROM PLACE_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = 3) pl JOIN PLACE p USING (PLACE_NO) left JOIN (SELECT max(PLACE_NO) as "PLACE_NO", max(PLACE_IMAGE_PATH) PLACE_IMAGE_PATH, max(PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE) PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE FROM PLACE_IMAGE GROUP by place_no) pi USING (place_no) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND PLACE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY LIKE_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
DELETE FROM PLACE_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = ? AND PLACE_NO = ?
SELECT PLACE_IMAGE_NO , PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE , PLACE_IMAGE_PATH FROM PLACE_IMAGE WHERE PLACE_NO = ?
UPDATE PLACE SET PLACE_COUNT = PLACE_COUNT + 1 WHERE PLACE_NO = ? AND PLACE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_TITLE ,PLACE_CONTENT_POINT ,PLACE_CONTENT_DETAIL ,PLACE_THEMA ,PLACE_ADDRESS ,PLACE_HOMEPAGE ,PLACE_CONTACT ,PLACE_TIME ,PLACE_START ,PLACE_END FROM PLACE WHERE PLACE_NO = ? AND PLACE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_TITLE ,PLACE_CONTENT_POINT ,PLACE_CONTENT_DETAIL ,PLACE_THEMA ,PLACE_ADDRESS ,PLACE_HOMEPAGE ,PLACE_CONTACT ,PLACE_TIME ,PLACE_START ,PLACE_END FROM PLACE WHERE PLACE_NO = ? AND PLACE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PLACE_IMAGE_NO ,PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE ,PLACE_IMAGE_PATH FROM PLACE_IMAGE WHERE PLACE_NO = ? ORDER BY PLACE_IMAGE_LEVEL

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.REVIEW_NO, A.USER_NAME, A.REVIEW_STAR, A.REVIEW_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(REVIEW_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REVIEW_CREATE_DATE FROM( SELECT REVIEW_NO ,USER_NAME ,REVIEW_STAR ,REVIEW_CONTENT ,REVIEW_CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE PLACE_NO = ? ORDER BY REVIEW_CREATE_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM REVIEW JOIN PLACE USING(PLACE_NO) WHERE PLACE_NO = ?
SELECT LIKE_NO FROM PLACE_LIKE WHERE PLACE_NO = ? AND USER_NO =?
INSERT INTO PLACE_LIKE ( LIKE_NO, PLACE_NO, USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PLNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ? )

SELECT PLACE_NO, PLACE_TITLE, PLACE_CONTENT_POINT, PLACE_THEMA, PLACE_ADDRESS, PLACE_TIME, TO_CHAR(PLACE_START, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as "PLACE_START", TO_CHAR(PLACE_END, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as "PLACE_END", PLACE_COUNT, PLACE_IMAGE_PATH, PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE FROM PLACE LEFT JOIN PLACE_IMAGE USING (PLACE_NO) WHERE PLACE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT PLACE.PLACE_NO, PLACE_TITLE, PLACE_CONTENT_POINT, PLACE_THEMA, PLACE_ADDRESS, PLACE_TIME, TO_CHAR(PLACE_START, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as "PLACE_START", TO_CHAR(PLACE_END, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as "PLACE_END", PLACE_COUNT, PLACE_IMAGE_PATH, PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE FROM PLACE left JOIN (select max(PLACE_NO) as "PLACE_NO", max(PLACE_IMAGE_PATH) PLACE_IMAGE_PATH, max(PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE) PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE from PLACE_IMAGE GROUP by place_no) pi on (pi.place_no = PLACE.place_no) WHERE PLACE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PLACE_COUNT DESC)A WHERE 4 > ROWNUM

INSERT INTO PLACE ( PLACE_NO, PLACE_TITLE, PLACE_CONTENT_POINT, PLACE_CONTENT_DETAIL, PLACE_THEMA, PLACE_ADDRESS, PLACE_HOMEPAGE, PLACE_CONTACT, PLACE_TIME, PLACE_START, PLACE_END ) VALUES( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT PLACE_NO FROM PLACE WHERE PLACE_TITLE = ?
INSERT INTO PLACE_IMAGE ( PLACE_IMAGE_NO, PLACE_NO, PLACE_IMAGE_ORIGIN, PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE, PLACE_IMAGE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_PINO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO REVIEW( REVIEW_NO, PLACE_NO, USER_NO, REVIEW_STAR, REVIEW_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ? )
DELETE FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND USER_NO = ?

SELECT PLACE_NO, PLACE_TITLE, PLACE_CONTENT_POINT, PLACE_THEMA, PLACE_ADDRESS, PLACE_COUNT, PLACE_IMAGE_PATH, PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE FROM PLACE LEFT JOIN PLACE_IMAGE USING (PLACE_NO) WHERE PLACE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PLACE_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM PLACE LEFT JOIN PLACE_IMAGE USING (PLACE_NO) WHERE PLACE_STATUS = 'Y' AND PLACE_THEMA = ? AND PLACE_START = ? ORDER BY PLACE_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT PLACE_NO, PLACE_TITLE, PLACE_CONTENT_POINT, PLACE_THEMA, PLACE_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(PLACE_START, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as "PLACE_START", TO_CHAR(PLACE_END, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as "PLACE_END", PLACE_IMAGE_PATH, PLACE_IMAGE_CHANGE FROM PLACE LEFT JOIN PLACE_IMAGE USING (PLACE_NO) WHERE PLACE_STATUS = 'Y' AND PLACE_THEMA = ? AND PLACE_START = ? ORDER BY PLACE_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
